column1: Smoque BBQ////A small place that gets very busy
column2: so best to go off hours or you will be in a line out the door.  A great variety of ribs
column5: of course brisket too.  This food is smoked well and their dry rub is the best I've eaten.  Meat is moist
column6: tender and not over cooked with a perfect balance of spice.  I try other places because Smoque is far from me and I'm always disappointed (most of the time) and wishing I had done the drive to Smoque.  Once you try it
